general.components.troubleshooting.title: There was a connection problem
general.components.troubleshooting.instr: Disconnect the device from the computer
Reconnect the device to the computer
Unlock your Mudita device's screen (if applicable)
general.components.troubleshooting.addit: Check both USB cable and port for damages
Make sure the plug goes all the way into the port
Use the USB-C cable delivered with the device
Contact support if the problem persists
